com.datastax.dse.driver.api.core.metadata.schema

Interface DseViewMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Describable, DseRelationMetadata, RelationMetadata, ViewMetadata

    public interface DseViewMetadata
extends DseRelationMetadata, ViewMetadata
    Specialized materialized view metadata for DSE.

    This type exists only for future extensibility; currently, it is identical to ViewMetadata.

    Note that all returned ColumnMetadata can be cast to DseColumnMetadata.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.metadata.schema.ViewMetadata

        describe, describeWithChildren, getBaseTable, getWhereClause, includesAllColumns

      • Methods inherited from interface com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.metadata.schema.RelationMetadata

        getClusteringColumns, getColumn, getColumn, getColumns, getId, getKeyspace, getName, getOptions, getPartitionKey, getPrimaryKey
